                              STUFF ZACK COULD DO FOR YOU:-
_________________________________________________________________________________________
________________ACTIONS___________________|__________________COMMANDS____________________|
-PLAY GAMES WITH YOU----------------------|-----PLAY A GAME------------------------------|
-TELL YOU A JOKE TO ----------------------|-----JOKE-------------------------------------|
-TELL YOU A KNOCK KNOCK JOKE--------------|-----KNOCK KNOCK------------------------------|
-OPEN YOUR STUDENT PORTAL-----------------|-----OPEN PORTAL------------------------------|
-SLEEP/DEAFEN FOR 20SEC-------------------|-----SLEEP, DON'T/STOP LISTENING--------------|
-OPEN APPS--------------------------------|-----OPEN IN COMPUTER(VS CODE & SPOTIFY)------|
-OPEN WEBSITES----------------------------|-----OPEN-------------------------------------|
-READ FROM WIKIPEDIA----------------------|-----WIKIPEDIA--------------------------------|
-ANSWER SOME PERSONAL QUESTIONS-----------|-----WHO/HOW/ ARE YOU,WHO MADE YOU YOUR NAME--|
-TELL YOU THE LATEST NEWS-----------------|-----NEWS-------------------------------------|
-TELL THE TIME OF THE DAY-----------------|-----TIME-------------------------------------|
-TELL THE DAY OF THE WEEK-----------------|-----DAY--------------------------------------|
-SEARCH STUFF ON GOOGLE-------------------|-----WHAT IS, WHO IS--------------------------|
-LOCATE PLACES ON A MAP-------------------|-----WHERE IS---------------------------------|
-STOP RUNNING THE PROGRAM-----------------|-----SAY BYE----------------------------------|
__________________________________________|______________________________________________|

                              AND MORE TO COME VERY SOON!!
